# Advanced Settings Automated Messages

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/advanced-settings-automated-messages/

## Category
11 Automated Flows And Messages

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
AUTOMATED MESSAGES
Advanced Settings: Automated Messages
IN THIS ARTICLE
Always Show Staff Name in Notifications
Auto-Close Inactive Conversations
Text Message Auto-Response

To adjust automated message settings, open the Settings app and select Automated Messages > Advanced Settings.

Link copied
Always Show Staff Name in Notifications

When an appointment is booked without requesting a specific staff member, the staff member's name will not be included in any automated messages to the client such as booking confirmations or reminders.

Enable this toggle if the staff member's name should always be included in automated messages.

Link copied
Auto-Close Inactive Conversations

Specify the number of days after which to automatically close inactive conversations.

Link copied
Text Message Auto-Response

Enable this toggle to set up an automatic reply for text messages. Clients will receive this automatic reply if they text you or if they respond to one of your automated texts, including flow text messages sent from your marketing phone number.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
